}}'John Richard Krebs, Baron Krebs' FRS (born 11 April 1945, Sheffield, England)
is a renowned English zoologist researching in the field of behavioural ecology
of birds. He is currently the Principal of Jesus College, Oxford. "Elliott Coues Award, 1999: Sir John R. Krebs", Jesus
College Record, 2005. http://www.jesus.ox.ac.uk/fellows-and-staff/fellows/lord-
krebs Krebs was knighted in 1999, was the first Chairman of the British
Food Standards Agency (2000â05), and was created a life peer in 2007. He is
currently President of the British Science Association.
